predicate.note: Frames file for 'abduct' based on survey of sentences in the BNC corpus.

roleset.name: to carry someone off by force

example.name: transitive
example.text: His solicitor wrote him a letter at the airport, with a copy to the customs authorities, saying that Bella had evidence he was drinking and unfit to have the care of the child, whom he had anyway abducted without written consent.
